recommendations: Leelavathi Naidu “Have worked with saumya as an auditor...while I can't forget his smiling face and persistent manner of seeking data and diligent working style. He is very good at putting forth his point and very hard working champ. ”

Ashutosh Naik “As part of Statutory Audit Team, Saumya has always demonstrated his keenness to understand the compliance aspects of AIF’s which enabled him to come up with good audit observations / recommendations. Recommend him for PE / AIF / Investments role.”
